channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Discarded bin near Waitrose, 22nd December
item.description:
This random bin has been here for some weeks and is now causing litter problems as it does not get emptied. Rubbish is being left by the bin and is attracting foxes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Albany Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole Block of Garage Area, Balcony and Parking Bay Lights Out, 22nd December
item.description:
The garage area, balcony and parking bay lights from 18 to 12 Seacourt Road have failed. Probably a timer issue as they are coming on between 23:30pm and midnight instead of 17:00pm and 17:30pm. Control box is between 17 and 18 Seacourt Road. This is particularly of concern as the security light outside 16 Seacourt Road, which I reported on 8th Dec 25, has still not been fixed. Very alarming to be plunged into such complete darkness.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Seacourt Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
